transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Rajat ji bol rahe hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Rajat ji very good afternoon, Shreeya baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye na, good afternoon.
Executive: Main keh rahi hun sir, ab kaisi chal rahi hai services?
Customer: Main check karke batata hun, ek ek enquiry to aati hai.
Executive: Sir ek ek aa rahi hai, maine kaha bhi hai, sir thoda ab main kaunse din bol raha hun aapko, main main aapko shikayat kiya kya? 
Executive: Ki weekly aap active ho.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Aa jayengi, ek bar flow ban jayengi, ek bar kuch matlab aur matlab zyada byleads vagera use karo aur employees ek bar main baat kar leti hun ki jo bhi aa raha hai.
Customer: Humne to bol diya jo bhi aa raha hai, hamare kaam ki hai nahi hai sabko aap buy kar lo, humne to bol diya itna aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir byleads jo kaam ki hai wahi buy karna aap.
Customer: Main to sab kar raha hun uske baad dekhta hun kitni enquiries aati hain.
Executive: Haan, aur jo enquiries aa rahi hai na sir lead manager mein, aap ek bar main Shatal ji se baat kar leti hun ki unko bolenge wahin se follow karo, wahin se customer ko reply karo lead manager se ki apni enquiries badhegi, abhi daily basis pe ek ek aa rahi hai, calls bhi aa rahe hain na sir aapko, calls aa rahe hain na maine check kiya hai, calls aa rahe hain aapko, to aise karke sahi ho jayengi, baki ek bar jo pehle customer se deal hui hai ratings reviews ek bar ratings reviews mang lo sir matlab char hi ratings hai, to ek bar uhh.
Customer: Rating waiting par chalo theek hai baat kar lete hain.
Executive: Jisse deal ho gayi ho jisse apni matlab baat ho gayi ho unse to aap mang hi sakte ho na ki sir ek ratings reviews de do reviews de do mere products ke regarding.
Customer: Chaliye na main bolta hun.
Executive: Rajat ji ab main concern close kar deti hun, aap please aap.
Customer: Nahi main close wlose mat kariye, abhi aap check karne dijiye mere ko, aap close karoge nahi aayega main kal phir raise kar dunga.
Executive: Sir abhi aap ruk jao ek din.
Executive: Pehle to aap ye cheez samajh lijiye ki sir concern raise karne se matlab aisa nahi hai ki enquiries ekdam se badh jati hai.
Customer: Na badhe kam se kam concern to raise rahega na.
Executive: Concern aap isliye kholte ho ki mujhe baat karni hai IndiaMART se matlab apne account manager se baat karni hai.
Customer: Haan to aap to okay likh doge jabki cheeze okay nahi hongi.
Executive: Yahi hota hai har bar isliye aap ruk jaiye aaj ka din chaliye check karne dijiye, suniye na madam aaj ka din check kar lete hain phir aap kariye harbaiye mat.
Customer: Aaj ka din maine.
Customer: Aaj ka din ek bar dekh lete hain kya hai kaisa hai.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai, chaliye theek hai aap pehle ratings.
summary:
Concerns:

- Only one enquiry is being received daily.

- Wants relevant buyleads.

- Wants ratings and reviews for products.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will talk to Shatal ji to follow up.

- Executive asked to buy relevant buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, enquiries, ratings, reviews
